name: SIDDHARTH BHARTIYA GRAMIN VIKAS SANSTHAN
briefDescription: Siddharth Bhartiya Gramin Vikas Sansthan is Located in Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh.It's work along for Agriculture, Children, Civic Issues, Disaster Management,Dalit Upliftment, Drinking Water, Education & Literacy,Environment & Forests, Food Processing, Health & FamilyWelfare, HIV/AIDS, Micro Finance (SHGs), MinorityIssues, New & Renewable Energy, Nutrition, PanchayatiRaj, Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation, VocationalTraining, Water Resources, Women's Development &Empowerment, Youth Affairs.
